Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dhbw_loerrach.pvbvp.function.World

  • public class World
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by weva on 04.04.2017.
    const PLAYGROUND_WIDTH has to be odd
    const PLAYGROUND_HEIGHT has to be even
    const PANEL_WITH has to be even
